name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

key_work.title: Production design in Hollow Knight
key_work.brief_description: A 2D action game with an emphasis on skill and exploration, Hollow Knight has you fighting a fearsome host of deadly creatures, avoiding intricate traps and solving ancient mysteries as you make your own way through fungal wastes, forests of bone, and ruined underground cities.

constellations_primary.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_primary.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

end.title: The Cat Piano
end.brief_description: A city of singing cats is preyed upon by a shadowy figure intent on performing a twisted feline symphony.

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

links.description: Before making a world of bugs for Hollow Knight, game designer Ari Gibson previously created a world of cats as director of animated short film The Cat Piano.

start.title: Blacksad: Under the Skin
start.brief_description: BLACKSAD: Under the Skin - A dark corruption scandal in the heart of the New York City’s underworld for charismatic detective John Blacksad!

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

end.title: BoJack Horseman
end.creator_credit: Corey Campodonico, Alexander Bulkley, Richard Choi and Eric Blyler
end.brief_description: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the 90s - 20 years later. BoJack Horseman was the star of the hit TV show “Horsin’ Around,” but today he’s washed up, living in Hollywood, complaining about everything, and wearing colorful sweaters.

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

links.description: The world of Blacksad is filled with anthropomorphic animals, just like Netflix series BoJack Horseman. Although BoJack‘s colour palette is much brighter and cartoony, the emotional tone of the show is much bleaker.

start.title: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
start.brief_description: The land of Hyrule is in chaos. As Link, youâ€™ll be sent on a treacherous journey to return six precious Crystals to their origins in six stone statues. Only by defeating the guardians of the six palaces will you gain passage to the seventh palace, take on the ultimate challenge that awaits you, and wake the Princess Zelda from her sleeping spell. On your way, helpful villagers you encounter will offer clues and secret messages invaluable in your quest. As you guide Link through the levels of Hyrule, close-ups and overviews will enhance your video vision. Are you up to the challenge?

constellations_other.name: City of animals (Hollow Knight - Production Design)
constellations_other.description: The adorable bugs that occupy Hallownest in the game Hollow Knight aren't the first anthropomorphised critters in film.

links.description: The side-scrolling exploration of Hollow Knight is chiefly inspired by Zelda II. Team Cherry drew on its world-building and spell-slinging combat mechanics.

end.title: Zelda II: The Adventure of Link
end.brief_description: The land of Hyrule is in chaos. As Link, youâ€™ll be sent on a treacherous journey to return six precious Crystals to their origins in six stone statues. Only by defeating the guardians of the six palaces will you gain passage to the seventh palace, take on the ultimate challenge that awaits you, and wake the Princess Zelda from her sleeping spell. On your way, helpful villagers you encounter will offer clues and secret messages invaluable in your quest. As you guide Link through the levels of Hyrule, close-ups and overviews will enhance your video vision. Are you up to the challenge?

links.description: Zelda creator Shigeru Miyamoto regards Zelda II as the only creative failure of the franchise. BoJack Horseman creator Raphael Bob-Waksberg has been open about his own creative failings as a showrunner, specifically in the colourblind casting of Alison Brie as Vietnamese American Diane Nguyen.

links.description: The Cat Piano, narrated by Nick Cave, features a cat detective solving the mystery of disappearing cats. Blacksad: Under the Skin is a point-and-click adventure of a 1950s-era cat detective solving a grisly murder.
